column4: if i try to import something to the server from windows.. it refuses to read it
and this is a minecraft server!!! ....
ugh.. ill have to reinstall phpbb3... and webmin..
avenos is there anyway i can fix this?
is there anyway to fix it without haveing to reinstall my systm?
besides root
i did my home directory
how?
when i import anything from windows or create a new file i have to add 777 to the file permissions
i did sudo chown -R 777 .
You should have gotten an error that user 777 does not exist, (and nothing done).
And you would have had to have done it by sudo.  Is that right?  Your command was sudo chown 777 -R  But did you specify a path? Or not?
Looks like it was 775 instead of 777
Just do chown -R minecraft   (From the same dir and you did before.)
... which hopefully was /home/minecraft/
sudo chown -R minecraft
sudo chown -R minecraft   /home/minecraft/
http://pastebin.com/TDYWW0xL   i did sudo chown -R minecraft /home/minecraft
Ok, that should do it.
Where do the plugins go?
Where is minecraft/plugins ?  (Need to see full path)
its /home/minecraft/plugins
Did it require sudo or root to install the game files?
